# Literature Review

Prior research has highlighted the role of state capacity in shaping long-run development.  
For example, [@acemoglu2013monopoly] show how the monopoly of violence shaped outcomes in Colombia.  
Meanwhile, [@dell2018historical] examine how historical states in Vietnam influenced collective action and modern economic development.
